io.werval.controllers

Class Classpath

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.werval.controllers.Classpath

  • public class Classpath
extends Object
    Serve resources from the classpath.

    Always use chunked transfer encoding.

    MimeType detection done using Application MimeTypes, fallback to application/octet-stream.

    Log 404 at DEBUG level.

    Log 200 at TRACE level.

        public Classpath()

    • Method Detail

      • metainf

        public Outcome metainf(String path)
        Serve static files from META-INF/resources in classpath.

        If a directory is requested, filenames set in the werval.controllers.classpath.index config property are used to find an index file. Default value is no index file support.

        Parameters:
        path - Path of the requested resources, relative to META-INF/resources
        Returns:
        A Chunked Outcome if found, 404 otherwise

      • resource

        public Outcome resource(String basepath,
                        String path)
        Serve static resources from classpath.

        If a directory is requested, filenames set in the werval.controllers.classpath.index config property are used to find an index file. Default value is no index file support.

        Parameters:
        basepath - Base path of the requested resources, relative to the classpath root
        path - Path of the requested resources, relative to the basePath parameter
        Returns:
        A Chunked Outcome if found, 404 otherwise

      • resource

        public Outcome resource(String path)
        Serve static resources from classpath.

        If a directory is requested, filenames set in the werval.controllers.classpath.index config property are used to find an index file. Default value is no index file support.

        Parameters:
        path - Path of the requested resource, relative to the classpath root
        Returns:
        A Chunked Outcome if found, 404 otherwise
